topic.title: The Revolution (2006) - x265 DVDrip
topic.body:
13 episode miniseries, broadcast by The History Channel. It details the American Revolution, from its inception as an isolated rebellion against a foreign colonizing power to the creation of the United States of America that we know today.

The torrent contains all 13 episodes plus one bonus behind-the-scenes extra, encoded in x265 (HEVC - The future of video encoding!) 
Ripped from a DVD, quality isn't great but passable. Resolution 720x384
Audio is AAC stereo at 192kbps/48khz.

Please be courteous, and don't forget to seed 1:1+!

topic.title: Events That Changed History (Audiobook)
topic.body:
(added to Music category because there isn't a books category yet, damnit!) 

An audiobook by The Great Courses, "The World Was Never The Same: Events That Changed History" is a 36 course lecture by J. Rufus Fears from the University of Oklahoma. This course details the course of history from Hammurabi's first laws right up to the September 11th attacks that polarized the world.
(read more at http://www.thegreatcourses.com/courses/the-world-was-never-the-same-events-that-changed-history.html)

Audio details: 128kbps Joint Stereo MP3. Avg lecture runtime is appx. 30min, each file is appx. 25mb. (Comfortable headphones recommended!)

Please be courteous, and don't forget to seed 1:1+!

topic.title: Windows98SE - ISO + Serial
topic.body:
ISO for Windows98SE with serial key for problem-free installation. Used on my nostalgia gaming rig with great success. Scanned with Avast and MBAM, comes up clean. (It's packed in a .RAR file not of my doing, see no reason to re-pack yet)

Please be courteous, and don't forget to seed!

topic.title: Windows XP Pro SP3 x86 - Pirate's Black Edition (April 2015)
topic.body:
Disclaimer: This isn't my work, this is an ISO that I've stored from KAT before it got nuked. 

ISO for Windows XP Professional Edition - Service Pack 3, x86. It has all updates up to April 2015, as well as 21+ other tweaks and utilities to make it even more useful right out of the zip. Doesn't even need a serial key, just install and go.

Vet before you Rek - MD5 hash: dabe1c9c61164bf2fa6098fff8a76ed4

Please be courteous, and don't forget to seed!

topic.title: Hiren's BootCD v15.2 (ISO)
topic.body:
Bootable ISO of Hiren's BootCD, a critical recovery disk for any task. Capable of repairing MBR and GPT disks that may have lost their bootloader, among many other useful things.

Version 15.2, released November 2012, is the most recent version as of August 2016. 

You can download the version directly from their website here: http://www.hirensbootcd.org/download/  
But the torrent will likely have faster download speeds and be less likely to become corrupt.
Vet before you Rek - MD5 hash: 7efc81adbbd551d56f6021c439c6837c
 
Please be courteous, and don't forget to seed!
